CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Herein , we report synthesis and characterization of two polymers , POBDTPD and PEBDTPD , that consist of DTPD and BDT moieties substituted with octyloxy or 2-ethylhexyloxy g r o u p s , r e s p e c t i v e l y .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| DTPD |
| BDT |

Note:

* POBDTPD and PEBDTPD are the names of specific polymers mentioned in the paragraph.
* DTPD and BDT are the names of the moieties that make up the polymers.
* Octyloxy and 2-ethylhexyloxy are not materials, but rather substituents that are attached to the DTPD and BDT moieties. Therefore, they are not included in the list of material names.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| DTPD |
| BDT |
